Lyric:
[by:hondoes]
[00:16.06]Down to my last match fire
[00:18.69]I'll touch just to feel
[00:23.81]Why's it easier to burn than it is to heal
[00:29.27]
[00:31.87]Out in the cold you have been
[00:33.88]I've begged you to come back in
[00:35.85]But I can't do this again
[00:37.81]
[00:39.38]I can't keep you from harm
[00:41.31]But I'm set on fire to keep you warm
[00:43.32]I can't go on and on
[00:45.48]Setting fires to keep you warm
[00:47.15]I can't keep you from harm
[00:49.05]But I'm set on fire to keep you warm
[00:51.11]I can't go on and on
[00:53.27]Setting fires to keep you warm
